text: @realDonaldTrump Young People are not afraid of your Racist mind set. Floyd Death any Covid-19 pandemic was in God's Plan to Bring This Racism and Confederate Monuments to the Forefront they're coming Down now or in November. Young People are not going away. Wear a Mask.
